com.lovo.netCRM.component

类 LovoComboBox<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JComboBox
            • com.lovo.netCRM.component.LovoComboBox<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ListDataListener

    public class LovoComboBox<T>
extends javax.swing.JComboBox
    下拉框组件
    示例：
               字符串下拉框
           LovoComboBox eduTxt = new LovoComboBox("文化程度",new String[]{"高中","大专","本科","硕士"},320,100,this);
                String edu = getItem();//得到选项

                对象下拉框
                public class ManBean {
                        private int id;
                        private String userName;
                        private String sex; 
                        private Date birthday;
                        ……
                        public String toString(){
                                return this.userName;
                        }
                }
                List list = new ArrayList();
                        list.add(new ManBean(1,"张三","男",Date.valueOf("1988-02-02")));
                        list.add(new ManBean(2,"李四","女",Date.valueOf("1990-12-12")));
                        list.add(new ManBean(3,"王五","男",Date.valueOf("1993-09-09")));
                        list.add(new ManBean(4,"王六加二","女",Date.valueOf("1987-11-02")));

                LovoComboBox combox = new LovoComboBox("员工",list,50,50,this);

                添加选项发生变化事件
                LovoComboBox combox = new LovoComboBox("员工",list,50,50,this){
                                public void onchange(Object t) {
                                        ManBean bean = (ManBean)t;
                                }
                        };

                设置下拉框选项
                LovoButton setButton = new LovoButton("设置", 260, 80, this);
                setButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    张成峰
    另请参阅:
    JComboBox, 序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LovoComboBox

        public LovoComboBox()
        创建空下拉框

      • LovoComboBox

        public LovoComboBox(java.lang.String[] items,
            int x,
            int y,
            java.awt.Container con)
        创建字符串下拉框
        参数:
        items - 字符串下拉框选项
        x - 下拉框X坐标
        y - 下拉框Y坐标
        con - 下拉框加入的容器

      • LovoComboBox

        public LovoComboBox(java.lang.String info,
            java.lang.String[] items,
            int x,
            int y,
            java.awt.Container con)
        创建带标题字符串下拉框
        参数:
        info - 下拉框标题
        items - 字符串下拉框选项
        x - 下拉框X坐标
        y - 下拉框Y坐标
        con - 下拉框加入的容器

      • LovoComboBox

        public LovoComboBox(java.lang.String info,
            java.util.List<T> list,
            int x,
            int y,
            java.awt.Container con)
        创建集合对象下拉框
        参数:
        info - 下拉框标题
        list - 对象数组(对象实体要求重写toString())
        x - 下拉框X坐标
        y - 下拉框Y坐标
        con - 下拉框加入的容器
